content: beginner friendly and simple to follow crochet ribbed beanie there is a full video tutorial taking you through how to complete the adult sized beanie easy to read size chart which details the following sizes newborn 3-6 months 6-12 months 1-3 years 3-10 years pre-teens teens adult and large adult ***pattern details*** - uk terms & us term - file type pdf - page size a4 210mm x 297mm - language english - download will include 2 colour pdf s 1 x uk terms 1 x us terms - hook size 8mm suggested yarn paintbox yarns simply chunky 100g/3 5oz 136m/149yd only 1 ball is needed to make any size don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com ***important*** - i do not accept returns or refunds - please do not copy or claim as your own - you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer - please do not sell the pdf - if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2020
